## purpose

Wordcloud of common terms in SEHM session proposals

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)

df <- readxl::read_excel("data/session_descriptions.xlsx")
```

```{r}
words <- df %>% 
  unnest_tokens(word, session_description) %>% 
  anti_join(stop_words)

words %>% 
  mutate(word = str_to_title(word)) %>% 
  count(word, sort = T)

library(wordcloud)

words %>%
  mutate(word = str_to_title(word)) %>%
  count(word, sort = T) %>%
  filter(n > 2,
         word != "Bengtsson") %>%
  with(wordcloud(word,
    n,
    max.words = 60,
    colors = brewer.pal(8, "Paired"),
    rot.per = 0.2
  ))
```
